snippet: The decline in U.S. sales of carbonated soft drinks accelerated in 2013, according to a leading beverage industry newsletter....

headline.print_headline: U.S. Soda Sales Decline Worsened in 2013: Beverage Digest
headline.main: U.S. Soda Sales Decline Worsened in 2013: Beverage Digest

lead_paragraph: The decline in U.S. sales of carbonated soft drinks accelerated in 2013, according to a leading beverage industry newsletter.
